original_text: They made a horn at each of the four corners, so that the horns and the altar were of one piece, and they overlaid the altar with bronze.
korean_text: 그 네 모퉁이 위에 그 뿔을 만들되 그 뿔을 제단과 연결하게 하고 제단을 놋으로 쌌으며

sentences.original_text: They made a horn at each of the four corners
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 귀퉁이 각각에 뿔을 만들었고

sentences.original_text: so that the horns and the altar were of one piece
sentences.korean_translation: 뿔과 제단이 한 조각이 되게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: and they overlaid the altar with bronze
